# A2 Slow Walk Skip
Area: Forest Castle: Royal Chamber 
Difficulty: Beginner (table for different kinds of difficulties?)

Variations:
## {.tabset}
### Heavyhold
Dash into the red box and without letting go of the dash button, heavyhold.

> If you get a dashswing instead of a heavyhold, you are either:
> ♦ Pressing heavy after the dash animation ends
> ♦ Not having dash held down while you press heavy
> `(markdown lists break the is-warning/error... tags so used a custom bullet)`
{.is-warning}


```diagram

```

### Podlaunch

Dash and get a running double jump. Try to line up the apex of your jumps to the red box. When you are in the red box, do a podlaunch.

```diagram

```
